title: 关于雕像mod....
author: kibako
txt_content: 服务器本来打算加入雕塑mod的但是加入后出现了一下问题。。加mod前聊天能显示前缀称号和名字颜色...加入后就全白色了。。mod链接：http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=315162&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D1%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E9%259B%2595%25E5%2583%258F%26searchoption%5B143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D说一下服务器版本是1.7.2的~ 求大神解决qwq。

replies.author: xiaoxiaoyiji
replies.txt_content: TMD坑爹MOD 删了吧我的服务器也是

replies.author: xiaoxiaoyiji
replies.txt_content: 而且这个MOD BUG很多 保证让你痛不欲生！
